item.title: Some of the stars (their names)
item.summary: Bushman names for Stars. Given by /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-32. 8826 rev., 8842 and 8843, 8841 rev. and 8842 rev.). The stars (in Orion's belt) are named according to the hunting of springbok.
item.comments: 1) p.8841v: |han≠kass'o heard this from his mother (|xabbi-an), 2) pp.8841v & 8842v: the stars are named according to the hunting of springbok, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-32
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: are named according to springbok or game hunting
accounting for the giving of names to stars
stars in Orion's belt named according to springbok hunting
